item.title: YZY Money: In the coming days, a new feature will be released for YZY users
item.description: On August 22nd, Kanye West initiated YZY MONEY and sent out a tweet stating, "In the forthcoming days, novel features will be implemented for YZY users. Engaging in innovative projects in the short term while concentrating on long-term sustainable growth."

item.title: Navarro: Powell's Anti-Trump Stance is Alarming
item.description: On August 22nd, the White House trade adviser Navarro stated that Powell's anti-Trump stance is causing unease. (FX168)

item.title: The probability of a Fed rate cut in September has decreased to 71.5%.
item.description: On August 22nd, based on CME's "FedWatch" tool, the likelihood of the Fed keeping interest rates unchanged in September is 28.5%, while the probability of a 25-basis-point interest rate cut is 71.5%.Previously, it was reported that the initial jobless claims in the US for the week ending August 16 were 235,000. The expected value was 225,000, and the previous value was 224,000.

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Bull Market Sentiment Index Shifts from 'Bullish Froth' to 'Neutral'
item.description: On August 22nd, Julio Moreno, the Research Director of CryptoQuant, stated that the Bitcoin Bull Market Index has shifted from the "Bullish Chill" phase to the "Neutral" phase, and the index has decreased from 70 to 50. For the purpose of risk management, if this index weakens further, it indicates that the Bitcoin price may continue to decline.

item.title: Korean Prosecutors Seek to Sentence South Korean Actress Hwang Jung-eum to 3 Years in Prison for Embezzling 4.2 Billion KRW in Public Funds to Invest in Cryptocurrency
item.description: August 22nd. As per Yonhap News Agency, the South Korean prosecutor sought a 3-year prison term for actor Hwang Jung-eum, who is facing accusations of embezzling 4.3 billion South Korean Won (approximately $3.07 million) of company funds and investing in cryptocurrency.On the 21st, during the closing argument in a public trial at the Jeju District Prosecutor's Office, it requested the Jeju District Court Criminal Division 2 (Presiding Judge Im Namin) to sentence actor Hwang Jung-eum to 3 years in prison on charges of violating the "Specific Economic Crimes Aggravation Act Punishment and other relevant laws" (embezzlement).Previously reported on June 17th, South Korean actress Hwang Jung-eum was accused of embezzling around 4.2 billion South Korean Won (about $3.07 million) of company funds to invest in cryptocurrency. Her agency, Y1 Entertainment, stated on June 17th that Hwang Jung-eum had repaid the full amount in two installments on May 30th and June 5th. Earlier, Hwang Jung-eum

item.title: Encryption security company Kerberus has announced the acquisition of Refract.
item.description: On August 21st, as reported by The Block, the cryptocurrency security firm Kerberus declared the acquisition of the wallet anti-fraud browser extension Pocket Universe from its developer Refract for a sum in the seven-figure range.According to the announcement, Kerberus will incorporate Pocket Universe into its native Sentinel3 security extension, thereby expanding antivirus protection to all EVM chains and Solana. The company also intends to keep Pocket's user experience "unaltered."

item.title: CryptoQuant Analyst: Bitcoin Whales are Buying the Dip, Accumulating Over 16,000 BTC in the Past 7 Days
item.description: On August 21st, CryptoQuant analyst CauÃª Oliveira stated, "During the past seven days, Bitcoin whale wallets have accumulated more than 16,000 BTC, suggesting that whales are purchasing on dips when the Bitcoin price declines."

item.title: DaoBank becomes the first third-party custodian to launch services on the J.P. Morgan Digital Asset Platform
item.description: On August 21st, State Street became the first third-party custodian to initiate services on JPMorgan's digital debt servicing platform, thereby offering institutional clients blockchain-based debt security custody services. (Sohu Finance)

item.title: Total OKB 24h Contract Trading Volume across the Network: $398 million, a 726.98% increase
item.description: On August 21st, based on Coinglass data, the current total open interest of OKB futures is $22.0646 million, with a 24-hour increase of 244.74%. The futures trading volume is $398 million, with a 24-hour increase of 726.98%. The 24-hour aggregated long/short ratio is 1.0412.

item.title: Coinbase Research Director: Predicts Stablecoin Market Size Could Reach $1.2 Trillion by 2028
item.description: On August 21st, David Duong, the Research Director of Coinbase, wrote that Coinbase Research employed a random model and the Monte Carlo simulation method to predict that the stablecoin market could reach $1.2 trillion by 2028. Future growth projections generally rely on assumptions regarding the share of the global money supply that stablecoins could ultimately hold. The model captures the potential growth range of the market through an autoregressive model AR(1), commencing from the most recent observed level and month-on-month growth, and simulates 20,000 Monte Carlo paths on a monthly basis in accordance with a simple AR(1) process. The predicted outcomes indicate that by December 2028, the stablecoin market could reach $1.2 trillion.
